Estimaciones y proyecciones Ecuador - Revisión 2022 Chapter 1 Introducción

Estimaciones y proyecciones Ecuador - Revisión 2022 Equipo de proyecciones poblacionales - CPV 2022 2022-05-13 Chapter 1 Introducción This is a sample book written in Markdown. You can use anything that Pandocs Markdown supports, e.g., a math equation \(a^2 + b^2 = c^2\). The bookdown package can be installed from CRAN or Github: install.packages("bookdown") # or the development version # devtools::install_github("rstudio/bookdown") Remember each Rmd file contains one and only one chapter, and a chapter is defined by the first-level heading #. To compile this example to PDF, you need XeLaTeX. You are recommended to install TinyTeX (which includes XeLaTeX): https://yihui.name/tinytex/.

Chapter 2 Población You can label chapter and section titles using {#label} after them, e.g., we can reference Chapter 2. If you do not manually label them, there will be automatic labels anyway, e.g., Chapter ??. Figures and tables with captions will be placed in figure and table environments, respectively. par(mar = c(4, 4, .1, .1)) plot(pressure, type = 'b', pch = 19) Figure 2.1: Here is a nice figure! Reference a figure by its code chunk label with the fig: prefix, e.g., see Figure 2.1. Similarly, you can reference tables generated from knitr::kable(), e.g., see Table 2.1. knitr::kable( head(iris, 20), caption = 'Here is a nice table!', booktabs = TRUE ) Table 2.1: Here is a nice table! Chapter 3 Fecundidad Here is a review of existing methods.
Chapter 4 Mortalidad 4.1 Registro Estadístico de Defunciones Censales 4.2 Mortalidad infantil 4.3 Mortalidad adulta 4.4 Tablas de Mortalidad

Chapter 4 Mortalidad We describe our methods in this chapter. Math can be added in body using usual syntax like this 4.1 Registro Estadístico de Defunciones Censales \(p\) is unknown but expected to be around 1/3. Standard error will be approximated \[ SE = \sqrt(\frac{p(1-p)}{n}) \approx \sqrt{\frac{1/3 (1 - 1/3)} {300}} = 0.027 \] You can also use math in footnotes like this1. We will approximate standard error to 0.0272 4.2 Mortalidad infantil 4.3 Mortalidad adulta 4.4 Tablas de Mortalidad 4.4.1 Tablas de Mortalidad 1950-1962 4.4.2 Tablas de Mortalidad 1974-1982 where we mention \(p = \frac{a}{b}\) \(p\) is unknown but expected to be around 1/3. Standard error will be approximated \[ SE = \sqrt(\frac{p(1-p)}{n}) \approx \sqrt{\frac{1/3 (1 - 1/3)} {300}} = 0.027 \]
Chapter 5 Migración Some significant applications are demonstrated in this chapter.
Chapter 6 Conciliación demográfica We have finished a nice book.
